Getopt::EX::Hashed - Hash object automation for Getopt::Long
Getopt::EX::Hashed - Getopt::Long 的哈希对象自动化
B<Getopt::EX::Hashed> is a module to automate the creation of a hash object to store command line option values for B<Getopt::Long> and compatible modules including B<Getopt::EX::Long>. The module name shares the B<Getopt::EX> prefix, but it works independently from other modules in B<Getopt::EX>, so far.
B<Getopt::EX::Hashed> 是一个自动创建哈希对象的模块，用于存储 B<Getopt::Long> 和兼容模块（包括 B<Getopt::EX::Long>）的命令行选项值。模块名称共享 B<Getopt::EX> 前缀，但到目前为止，它独立于 B<Getopt::EX> 中的其他模块运行。
The major objective of this module is integrating initialization and specification into a single place. It also provides a simple validation interface.
该模块的主要目标是将初始化和规范整合到一个地方。它还提供了一个简单的验证接口。
Accessor methods are automatically generated when C<is> parameter is given. If the same function is already defined, the program causes fatal error. Accessors are removed when the object is destroyed. Problems may occur when multiple objects are present at the same time.
当给出 C<is> 参数时，将自动生成访问方法。如果已经定义了相同的函数，程序将导致致命错误。对象销毁时，访问器将被移除。当多个对象同时存在时，可能会出现问题。

If you want to make accessors for all following members, use C<configure> to set the C<DEFAULT> parameter.
如果要为以下所有成员创建访问器，请使用 C<configure> 设置 C<DEFAULT> 参数。
If you don't like assignable accessors, configure the C<ACCESSOR_LVALUE> parameter to 0. Because accessors are generated at the time of C<new>, this value is effective for all members.
如果不喜欢可分配访问器，可将 C<ACCESSOR_LVALUE> 参数设置为 0。 因为访问器是在 C<new> 时生成的，所以该值对所有成员都有效。
Set default value. If no default is given, the member is initialized as C<undef>.
设置默认值。如果没有给出缺省值，则成员初始化为 C<undef>。
If the value is a reference to an ARRAY or HASH, a shallow copy is created for each C<new> call. This means the reference itself is copied, but the contents are shared. Modifying the array or hash contents will affect all instances.
如果值是对 ARRAY 或 HASH 的引用，则每次调用 C<new> 都会创建一个浅层副本。这意味着引用本身被复制，但内容是共享的。修改数组或 HASH 内容将影响所有实例。
If a code reference is given, it is called at the time of B<new> to get default value. This is effective when you want to evaluate the value at the time of execution, rather than declaration. If you want to define a default action, use the B<action> parameter. If you want to set code reference as the initial value, you must specify a code reference that returns a code reference.
如果给定了代码引用，则会在调用 B<new> 时调用它以获取默认值。当您想在执行时而不是在声明时评估值时，这种方法非常有效。如果要定义默认操作，请使用 B<action> 参数。如果要将代码引用设置为初始值，则必须指定一个返回代码引用的代码引用。
If a reference to SCALAR is given, the option value is stored in the data indicated by the reference, not in the hash object member. In this case, the expected value cannot be obtained by accessing the hash member.
如果给出 SCALAR 的引用，则选项值将存储在引用所指示的数据中，而不是哈希对象成员中。在这种情况下，无法通过访问哈希对象成员获得预期值。
Parameter C<action> takes code reference which is called to process the option. C<< action => >> label can be omitted if and only if it is the first parameter.
参数 C<action> 带有处理选项时调用的代码引用。如果 C<<action => >> 标签是第一个参数，则可以省略。
When called, hash object is passed as C<$_>.
调用时，哈希对象作为 C<$_> 传递。
You can use this for C<< "<>" >> to handle non-option arguments. In that case, the spec parameter does not matter and is not required.
您可以将此用于 C<< "<>">> 来处理非选项参数。在这种情况下，规格参数并不重要，也不是必需的。

以下参数均用于数据验证。首先，C<must> 是一个通用验证器，可以实现任何功能。其他参数是常用规则的快捷方式。

A class method that creates a new hash object. Initializes all members with their default values and creates accessor methods as configured. Returns a blessed hash reference. The hash keys are locked if LOCK_KEYS is enabled.
创建新散列对象的类方法。使用默认值初始化所有成员，并根据配置创建访问方法。返回一个受祝福的哈希引用。如果启用了 LOCK_KEYS，哈希键将被锁定。
Returns the option specification list which can be passed to the C<GetOptions> function.
返回可传递给 C<GetOptions> 函数的选项规范列表。
C<GetOptions> has the capability of storing values in a hash by giving the hash reference as the first argument, but it is not necessary.
C<GetOptions> 可以通过将哈希引用作为第一个参数在哈希中存储值，但这并非必要。

When LOCK_KEYS is enabled, accessing a non-existent member causes an error. Use this method to declare new member keys before accessing them.
启用 LOCK_KEYS 后，访问不存在的成员会导致错误。在访问新成员键之前，请使用此方法声明新成员键。
If you want to access arbitrary keys, unlock the object.
如果要访问任意键，请解锁对象。

您可以通过带有 C<LOCK_KEYS> 参数的 C<configure> 改变这种行为。
Use class method C<< Getopt::EX::Hashed->configure() >> before creating an object; this information is stored separately for each calling package. After calling C<new()>, the package-level configuration is copied into the object for its use. Use C<< $obj->configure() >> to update object-level configuration.
在创建对象之前，请使用类方法 C<< Getopt::EX::Hashed->configure() >>；每个调用包都会单独存储此信息。调用 C<new()> 后，软件包级配置将复制到对象中供其使用。使用 C<< $obj->configure() >> 更新对象级配置。
The following configuration parameters are available.
可使用以下配置参数。
Lock hash keys. This prevents typos or other mistakes from creating unintended hash entries.
锁定哈希键。这样可以防止输入错误或其他错误创建意外的哈希条目。
Automatically create option aliases with underscores replaced by dashes.
自动创建选项别名，下划线改为破折号。
Automatically create option aliases with underscores removed.
自动创建去掉下划线的选项别名。
Set the function name called from the C<getopt> method.
设置 C<getopt> 方法调用的函数名。
When specified, it will be prepended to the member name to make the accessor method. If C<ACCESSOR_PREFIX> is defined as C<opt_>, the accessor for member C<file> will be C<opt_file>.
指定后，它将作为成员名的前缀，使其成为访问方法。如果 C<ACCESSOR_PREFIX> 被定义为 C<opt_>，成员 C<file> 的访问器将是 C<opt_file>。
If true, read-write accessors have the lvalue attribute. Set to zero if you don't like that behavior.
如果为 true，读写访问器将具有 lvalue 属性。如果不喜欢这种行为，请设置为零。
Set default parameters. When C<has> is called, DEFAULT parameters are inserted before the explicit parameters. If a parameter appears in both, the explicit one takes precedence. Incremental calls with C<+> are not affected.
设置默认参数。调用 C<has> 时，DEFAULT 参数会插入显式参数之前。如果一个参数同时出现在两个参数中，则显式参数优先。使用 C<+> 的递增调用不受影响。
A typical use of DEFAULT is C<is> to prepare accessor methods for all following hash entries. Declare C<< DEFAULT => [] >> to reset.
DEFAULT 的一个典型用法是 C<is> 为下面所有哈希条目准备访问方法。声明 C<< DEFAULT => [] >> 以重置。
Set a code reference to generate error messages for validation failures. The code reference receives the same arguments as the option handler ($_[0] is option name, $_[1] is the value for simple options, or $_[1] and $_[2] for hash options). The default function generates messages like "--option=value: option validation error".
设置代码引用，以便在验证失败时生成错误信息。代码引用接收与选项处理程序相同的参数（$_[0] 是选项名称，$_[1] 是简单选项的值，或 $_[1] 和 $_[2] 是哈希选项的值）。默认函数会生成类似"--option=value：选项验证错误 "的信息。
Reset the class to the original state.
将类重置为原始状态。
